serviceDescription: Provides debugging tools and utilities for troubleshooting and testing integrations, including session information retrieval, action triggering, and integration discovery.

getSessionInfo.description: Get basic session info for debug purposes.

triggerIntegrationAction.description: Trigger an integration action for debug purposes.

discoverLeanActions.description: Discover lean actions for all integrations.

getIntegration.description: Get a specific integration by ID.
